I have finally laid day the plans for completing my 50 scenarios (I 
just got to fill in the blanks for an extra one).

Starting in December, I would like to do in a scenario review for all 
the built-in scenarios.  This might seem boring, but it's a nice way 
to bring everyone to the same page on scenarios.

Have a happy Thanksgiving Day!
